Detailed Description

Definitions of namespaces.

C++

  • example: 
    namespace Directions    // this->nameSpace = "Directions", nameSpaceType = new NameSpaceType()
{   // -> start of this->body
    enum
    {
        LEFT,
        RIGHT,
        UP,
        DOWN
    }
}   // -> end of this->body
